data.name: RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Underdeep
data.detailed_description:
The drumming, the drumming in the Deep…

Far below the surface dwell creatures of twisted visage and vile hearts. They have thrived in the darkness, and for centuries have amassed their numbers. Now, they march for the surface…

Orcs, trolls, ettins, even a mighty dragon await you in the Underdeep! But that is not all, for both the Dark Elves and Dwarves also live deep within the earth. Tiles, monsters, and three races of characters all themed around caverns will allow you to build complex dungeons for your players to explore and gain riches! When combined with other PVGames assets (namely Medieval: Dungeons), the possibilities grow exponentially.

Included in the Medieval: Underdeep pack are as follows:
  • 12 Tile sheets for cavernous environments, including varying ground types, stalagmites, entrances/exits, Dwarven-themed furniture, bridges, webs, and more!
  • 5 Seamless fog and lava overlays that can be used as scrolling layers.
  • 3 unique character races, Dwarves, Orcs, and Dark Elves, all of which come with a combined total of 177 pieces of clothing, armor, weapons, hair styles, equipment, etc to fully customize your own characters. All of the Dark Elf and Orc clothing options are fully compatible with all human character clothing options and templates from other PVGames Medieval sets and vice versa.
  • 4 Dark Elf character templates, 5 Dwarf character templates, 6 Orc character templates.
  • Each character template and piece of equipment, clothing, etc comes with the resources to create over 50 different spritesheets ranging from walking, running, sleeping, sitting, side-view combat, down poses, idling, and much more – many in both 4 and 8 directions! On top of that, each comes with the resources to make busts, paperdolls, and facesets!
  • 8 stand-alone monsters, each with busts, facesets, oversized battlers, animated side-view battler spritesheets, walking spritesheets, idling spritesheets, and more!
  • 13 Pre-made characters utilizing the resources within are included.
  • Separated shadows for all character templates.
  • Revised Read-Me and Instruction document, as well as link to updated Character Creator software (which is free!)

data.short_description: Far below the surface dwell creatures of twisted visage and vile hearts. They have thrived in the darkness, and for centuries have amassed their numbers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Underdeep
